scripts.UI: cross env dev tests: cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --quiet --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI-tests/cross-env-tests.spec.cy.js'
scripts.UI: cross env prod tests: cross-env TEST_ENV=prod npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --quiet --spec 'cypress/e2e/UI-tests/cross-env-tests.spec.cy.js'
